name: A Fisherman's Home is the Sea
name_original: A Fisherman's Home is the Sea
description:
Made for "STOP WAITING FOR GODOT" game jam

This was my first time using Godot :D

This game was inspired by the songs of Dorival Caymmi

All songs and their titles are his and his family's property

You can check some songs HERE

Beach ambience sound by mixkit.co
